## AddContentReturn.dispatchCommand() method

Takes any command as an input and dispatches it within the document context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dispatchCommand(command: CommandFunction): AddContentReturn<GExtension>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  command | <code>CommandFunction</code> | the command function to run with the current state and view |

<b>Returns:</b>

`AddContentReturn<GExtension>`
